name: Auto Collections Random Collections
overview: Randomly displays collections on the Jellyfin home screen
description: Adds random collections to your home screen. Access random collections via the API endpoint. Configurable number of collections with per-user caching to reduce frequent changes. Includes comprehensive logging for troubleshooting.

versions.changelog:
- Fixed configuration page registration
- Added proper logging with ILogger
- Standalone API controller for accessing random collections
- Removed HomeScreenSections dependency
- Added REST API endpoints: /RandomCollections/Get, /RandomCollections/Items/{id}, /RandomCollections/Refresh
- Enhanced error handling and diagnostics

- Initial release
- Random collection selection for home screen
- Configurable number of collections (1-20)
- Per-user caching to reduce frequent changes
- Smart refresh on server restart and page reload
